Author: nickb
Content: Mono/Moonlight... what a pointless waste of time. These smart programmers are spending their lives blindly copying MS products. I think this is programmer's hell.

Author: schoudha
Content:
Weebly makes a great product but site building software is a crowded space. 
Do people need or want more than their facebook/myspace profile or wik i services? I guess we'll find out.
